item.title: Judge in Trump Murdoch libel case handled lawsuit president dropped against Michael Cohen
item.description: Proving that the Wall Street Journal's reporting is false would require Trump to answer questions under oath about Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: Hunter Biden blames Ambien for President Biden's terrible Trump debate
item.description: President Joe Biden's disastrous debate performance set events in motion that concluded with his dropping out of the 2024 presidential election.

item.title: Trump Media builds $2 billion bitcoin hoard, as cryptocurrency swells president's net worth
item.description: Trump has embraced digital currency to such a degree that crypto now reportedly accounts for most of his net worth.

item.title: Bessent: Imposing Aug. 1 tariffs 'will put more pressure' on trade partners for deals
item.description: The Treasury secretary and Commerce Sec. Howard Lutnick both seem to view Aug. 1's steep tariffs as added leverage in talks that will continue past th...

item.title: U.S. eyes 'back to basics' revamp of G20 when it assumes presidency next year: Reuters
item.description: The U.S. aims to pare the G20 back to its financial roots next year when it takes over the rotating presidency from South Africa, Reuters reported.
